headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. For this endpoint, use multipart/form-data .

parameters.name: upload_id
parameters.description: The ID of the upload task.

parameters.name: signature
parameters.description: The MD5 of the chunk, used as a checksum to verify data integrity.

parameters.name: start_offset
parameters.description: The starting offset of the current chunk.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: start_offset
fields.description: The starting offset of the uploaded chunk.

fields.name: end_offset
fields.description: The ending offset of the uploaded chunk. When the start_offset value is equal to the end_offset value, the last chunk has been uploaded. Then you can call /file/finish/upload/ to finish the upload.
